     174             :   std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &o, BaseException const &e);
     175             : 
     176             :   /* @brief Convert EnvironmentError to a string.
     177             :    *
     178             :    * The number of arguments used when creating the EnvironmentError impact
     179             :    * the resulting "type" || formatting of the chain. We aim to mimic python
     180             :    * behavior of course:
     181             :    * - only one arg, then assume it can be converted to string,
     182             :    * - two args, then the first one is the errno, the next one a string,
     183             :    * - three args, like two args, adding "filename" as third one (after ':')
     184             :    * - four || more args, the "tuple" used to construct the exception
     185             :    *
     186             :    */
     187             :   std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &o, EnvironmentError const &e);
     188             : }
